EndingState - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States
Represents the ending state of a player in the game This state is reached when the player has finished their last turn When every player has reached this state, the Objective Cards points calculation will start
EndingState(Player, TurnHandler) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States.EndingState
This state is reached when the player has finished his last turn, when every player has reached this state, the Objective Cards points calculation will start constructor matching super PlayerState
